name: Minecraft - Feed the Beast
description: edited download path for jar file to correct site as of 06 Dec 2019
notes:
Requires Oracle Java Runtimes
For Ubuntu/Mint:
    sudo add-apt-repository ppa:webupd8team/java
    sudo apt update
    sudo apt install oracle-java8-installer

Doesn't work on Java v9.

Depending on your java install, you may need to change the java location in Lutris under Game Options:
Executable "/usr/bin/java"
content:
files:
- FTB_Launcher: https://dist.creeper.host/FTB2/launcher/FTB_Launcher.jar
game:
  args: -jar FTB_Launcher.jar
  exe: /usr/bin/java
  working_dir: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- move:
    dst: $GAMEDIR
    src: FTB_Launcher
- chmodx: $GAMEDIR/FTB_Launcher.jar
